program.name: Cambridge Taxi Discount Coupon Program
program.description_short: Discounted taxi coupons for Cambridge seniors and people with disabilities
program.description:
The Cambridge Taxi Discount Coupon Program provides $50/month in taxi discount coupons to eligible Cambridge residents.

To qualify, you must:
- Be a Cambridge resident
- Be age 60 or older, OR have a disability

Note: You must register before receiving coupons. Coupon supply and distribution schedules may vary.
program.apply_button_description: Call CCPD (under 60 with disability) or Council on Aging (60+) to apply
program.website_description: Discounted taxi coupons for eligible Cambridge seniors and people with disabilities

warning_message.message: You must register before receiving coupons. Coupon supply and distribution schedules may vary.

documents.text: Proof of Cambridge residency (lease, utility bill)
Proof of age (60+) or disability documentation (if under 60)
